item.title: Resources for Graduate Students in OR/MS/ISE
item.description: In this blog post, I collected some of the resources that I have found/think might be helpful to me as a graduate student in OR/MS/ISE field. These resources include podcasts, tutorials, papers and articles, online courses and books.
